title: Dasht Jeyhun
text: Dasht Jeyhun (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Dasht Jeyḩūn; also known as Jaihūn, and Jeyḩūn) is a village in <a href="Kohurestan%20Rural%20District">Kohurestan Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Khamir%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Khamir%20County">Khamir County</a>, <a href="Hormozgan%20Province">Hormozgan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 245, in 44 families.
